page.title: 11ICKNELD WALK SCHOOL
page.content: {Icknield Walk School}was built in 1966.It is 19 years old. There are 10 {classes}in our school:- 1L:27 children 1D:29 children, 2B:18 chidren, 2C:23 children, 3R:26 children, 3B:24 children, 4D:27 children, 4S:30 children, Reception:52 children, Mrs. Does' class 8 children. We also have a Nursery. There are are 264 children in our school. We have a{hall}which we use for{assembly, dancing, drama}and {gymnastics.}In the{Kitchen}Mrs. Shepherd cooks the dinners. On the {playground}there are two{netball {courts, apparatus for climbing}and some{benches.}On Monday our class have their turn on the climbing frame. Most children like{Games}and the{Library} best. 1L have Library exchange on Wednesday. On Friday they have Games, and they practise{rounders}and sometimes they have a rounders game.
